thread.title: Established Website For Sale

title: Established Website For Sale
text: Questions Business Summary Established Online website running since 2000. I started this company from scratch, 15 years ago and have been running it with one employee. Product took several years to develop and is very unique with high profit margins and only 2 major competitors (yourself included!) With effort and time put in revenue is easily over $200,000 a year * Ranked page one for most related keywords, and several #1 spots. (not paid ads) * Over $50,000 spent on search engine optimization * Google rank 4 * 1000's of repeat customers and reviews * Can be run from home anywhere in Canada or USA. * Highly Automated, runs automatically 24 hours a day, 7 days a week * Proven Formula since 2000 (acrylic based paint ships worldwide, I only use solvent base on larger custom orders) * No Skills required, will fully train on all operating and manufacturing aspects. * Website very easy to operate, change pricing/update * Fully Functional eBay Business * Inventory/supplies/materials included - China distributor and all contacts/suppliers Financial Statements Available. Contact for more information on this website for sale. Financials
